Associate Director of Strategic Planning - Customer Alliance & Innovation - US Market
Working on technologies, products, and initiatives that improve patient outcomes.

Partnered with Chief Innovation Officer and developed a geo-centric enterprise app that replaces business cards. Initiated internal POC for Bluetooth Low Energy location-based services – to be commercialized in 2015. Performed critical technical due-diligence projects and sourced deals for partnerships. Organizer of the Samsung Developer Conference “Innovation” booth held at Moscone Center in SF where over 3,500 developers and Samsung partners participated.

Conceived and developed product, business plan, and go to market strategy. Led presentations to investors (Bain Capital, Highland Capital, Greylock Partners, Matrix Partners, Y-Combinator). Sold eleven on-premise licenses and gained 30,000 users after initial product release. Managed team of three software engineers, two marketers and one UX designer.

Sr. Leader, Bioinformatics Software Engineer at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center
October 12, 2017, Aijazuddin worked with Omid in different groups

I had privilege to work with Omid on several projects. Omid has a extraordinary attitude towards work, he is amazing team player and always thrives to understand business/workflow to translate them into a visionary product. He had build networks with teams and with JGI leadership, and has always pursued teams to cohesively work to work in an amicable environment. Technically, he is a strong, and with a "can do" attitude has revolutionized JGI's sample management project. He's a rare find, and personally, I wouldn't think twice to work with Omid!

Jonathan Sidi
Internet & Mobile Products Professional
July 2, 2016, Jonathan and Omid were students together

Omid is a highly talented technologist who I have had the pleasure to engage with over time. He is an entrepreneur at heart, constantly able to seize new opportunities. He is not only creative in his ideas but also very diligent in their execution, iterating through market feedback. On top of his strong software background, Omid understands very well the strategic and operational aspect of ventures, including people challenges. I have been impressed by his ability to clearly impart his learning and experience to people across the spectrum. Omid is a very pleasant and reliable person, and one would be very fortunate to have him in a team.

Paul Winward
Software Engineer at Infusionsoft
May 18, 2016, Omid worked with Paul in the same group

Omid has both technical and business acumen for turning great ideas into prototypes quickly.  I enjoyed working with him as a fellow developer, and it seemed to me that he always had several outside projects and business ideas going on in different stages of development simultaneously.  He understood that the efficient execution of an idea, and not just the potential of an idea, is the key to realizing success over failure.  He was a key leader in transforming our stagnant, uninspiring perl-based dev process into a robust and productive Java shop.  In a nutshell, he is a quick learner who is focused on results.

Sassan Behjat
Entrepreneur, Founder and CEO
November 24, 2015, Sassan was a client of Omid’s

Omid is an amazing inspiration and great motivator who keeps on surprising you with new ideas and solutions. He is cool in handling stressful situations (sometimes too cool!) and can dig-out information, pull up references, and reach out to his extensive network of professionals whenever hardcore data is required to reach a decision. What I admired most during the time we had the pleasure of having him on board was his serene and in-depth look into the problems and questions at hand, and his unique problem solving skills, which he offered in an easy to understand manner, many a times in form of infographics and slide-presentations. After all, he is a wonderful mix of science, technology and arts!
